trans-unit.source: The steps in this document use the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this document use the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see <linkText>DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Services and resources created in the Azure preview portal are not visible in the Azure portal, as they use a new resource model.
trans-unit.target: Services and resources created in the Azure preview portal are not visible in the Azure portal, as they use a new resource model.
